EmailTemplate.subject: New Pivotal Microsite for the Orange Community
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I’m excited to announce that we have recently launched a Orange & Pivotal microsite <[[https://content.pivotal.io/orangefr?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=email-english-orange]]> dedicated to Orange Group Community (all the countries and subsidiaries).
This microsite was built to engage Orange IT & Business Teams on topics like Cloud-Native, Microservices, DevOps, Security and Agile-at-scale, as well as to inform you on recent Pivotal product launches and customer use cases.
Don’t miss reading the Orange case study and listening to the podcast “Orange is going Cloud-Native”. You may also listen to a presentation from our Senior Vice President of R&D on Pivotal’s 2018 product roadmap. Both can be found on the microsite.
Feel free to share this microsite <[[https://content.pivotal.io/orangefr?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=email-english-orange]]> with any colleagues who might be interested in Pivotal and/or the topics listed above. Don’t hesitate to contact me if you have any questions on our joint collaboration.
Kind regards, Sylvain Tachoires Client Director, Pivotal ​ Mobile: +33 6 77 15 32 47
